data.message: Why is when a friend likes something on one of their friend's posts, showing up in my newsfeed along with whether I want to 'friend' the friend?? Or, if a friend comments on a post of friend of theirs, but not mine, it shows up too?!?!? STOP THAT, FB!! I want my own friends' stuff ONLY in my news feed!! AND what I post being only in my friends feeds....not theirs and their friends feed!!
